fields.Title of Contribution: “Relating electrophotographic printing model and ISO13660 standard attributes”
fields.Name of Conference: SPIE Electronic Imaging -- Image Quality and System Performance VII
fields.Description/Abstract:
A mathematical model of the electrophotographic printing process has been developed. This model can be used
mathematically for analysis, and to simulate the effects of these components on toner particle placement. The
model’s three main inputs, laser spread, charge to toner proportionality factor and toner particle size, produce
a wide variety of outputs. While the exact placement of toner particles is a random process, the total effect is
not. The effect of each model parameter on the ISO 13660 print quality attributes is noted and is described in
this paper. Particularly noted are the attributes line width, fill, raggedness and blurriness.
